chart_description: This chart shows the percentage of time that Netdata workers are busy processing data. A value of 100% means that all workers are busy and a value below 100% means that there are idle workers. This chart is helpful in determining the overall workload on the system and can indicate if there is a need to add more resources or optimize Netdata settings.

dimension_descriptions.average: The average busy time of all Netdata workers in percentage. This dimension can be used to track the overall trend of worker utilization over time.
